text: Dr. Kh. Nafiz Rahman is a Orthopedic Surgeon with 16 years of experience. He holds the qualifications MBBS, BCS (Health), D-Ortho (BSMMU), AO Trauma (Fellow). Currently practicing at Mirpur General Hospital and Diagnostic Center located at R#10, H#16, Rupnogor Residential Area, Beside of Monipur School), Mirpur, Dhaka., Mirpur, Dhaka, 1216, Bangladesh. Availability: Saturday to Thursday: 06:00 PM - 09:00 PM; Friday: Off.
